simplesect.para: TIM Output Compare Init structure definition.

simplesect.title: uint16_t TIM_OCMode
simplesect.para: Specifies the TIM mode. This parameter can be a value of TIM_Output_Compare_and_PWM_modes

simplesect.title: uint16_t TIM_OutputNState
simplesect.para:
Specifies the TIM complementary Output Compare state. This parameter can be a value of TIM_Output_Compare_N_State Note:
This parameter is valid only for TIM1 and TIM8.
